description: Blocks a specific application from accessing the network by creating Windows Firewall inbound and outbound rules for the target executable. Logs all actions and outputs a JSON report for SOC automation.

script_parameters.name: MaxWaitSeconds
script_parameters.description: Maximum wait time for user input and firewall rule application. Defaults to 300 seconds.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Path where the active response JSON result will be stored. Uses overwrite-safe NDJSON logging.

user_prompts.prompt: Enter full path of the application (.exe)
user_prompts.description: Full path to the target application to be blocked.
Friendly name for firewall rule labels.
